articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Elon Musk, the world's richest man, is being sued by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, which is trying to compel him to testify as part of a probe into his $44 billion takeover of social media giant Twitter, a Thursday court filing showed.
articles.title: SEC tries to force Musk to testify in Twitter takeover probe

articles.author: Tom Westbrook
articles.description: A lull in bond selling stretched into Asia trade on Friday, but may not last the day as investors waited on U.S. jobs data that could add to the case for keeping interest rates high for some time.
articles.title: Stocks climb in calm before potential US payrolls storm

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Elon Musk-led Tesla (TSLA.O) on Friday cut prices for its Model 3 and Model Y vehicles in the U.S., according to the electric vehicle maker's website.
articles.title: Tesla slashes prices of Model 3, Models Y vehicles in US

articles.author: Luc Cohen, Jody Godoy
articles.description: Sam Bankman-Fried's college roommate and ex-colleague, Gary Wang, testified on Thursday at the FTX cryptocurrency exchange founder's fraud trial that Bankman-Fried told him to give a hedge fund they co-owned special trading privileges on FTX.
articles.title: Sam Bankman-Fried demanded special privileges for his fund, ex-colleague testifies

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: South Korea's telecommunications regulator said on Friday that Alphabet Inc's (GOOGL.O) Google and Apple (AAPL.O) have abused their dominant app market position and warned of possible fines totalling up to $50.5 million.
articles.title: S.Korea considers $50.5 mln fine against Google, Apple over app market practices

articles.author: Chibuike Oguh
articles.description: Shares of Rivian Automotive Inc (RIVN.O) fell by more than 20% on Thursday, after the electric vehicle maker unveiled plans to issue $1.5 billion worth of convertible green bonds.
articles.title: EV maker Rivian shares tumble after launch of $1.5 bln convertible bond offering

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: MGM Resorts International (MGM.N) said on Thursday operational disruptions due to a cybersecurity issue in September are expected to have a negative impact on its third-quarter results.
articles.title: MGM expects cybersecurity issue to negatively impact third-quarter earnings

articles.author: Mica Rosenberg, Nandita Bose
articles.description: President Joe Biden's administration said on Thursday it will add sections to a border wall to stave off record migrant crossings from Mexico, a reversal that embraces a signature policy of former President Donald Trump.
articles.title: In reversal Biden to build more US border wall, Trump demands apology

articles.author: Idrees Ali, Huseyin Hayatsever
articles.description: The United States on Thursday shot down an armed Turkish drone that was operating near its troops in Syria, U.S. officials said, the first time Washington has brought down an aircraft of NATO ally Turkey.
articles.title: US jet shoots down Turkish drone in Syria, officials say

articles.author: Jasper Ward, Kanishka Singh
articles.description: Former University of Southern California (USC) campus gynecologist George Tyndall, who had been set to stand trial over accusations he sexually assaulted patients, has died, his defense attorney said on Thursday.
articles.title: Former USC gynecologist accused of abuse dies before trial could take place
